thread.section_title: Hotel Edouard 7 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One night business trip
thread.title_full: One night business trip - Review of Hotel Edouard 7, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DGM_1981
title: One night business trip
text: I stayed here last week when visiting a conference in Place Vendome. The hotel is small but adequate in size. I took a room with a view on the main street and opera. The room was very nice and well equiped. The service was very good from everyone I encountered. The location is excellent as its a short walk to shops and other sights and very close to the metro. I would recommend this hotel and I would return for a leisure visit in Paris. Its also about 15 mins from Gare de Lyon and Paris Est, just a few stops on the metro.
